definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: , nard, an odorif. plant fr. India (via Persia) (Skr. naladâ; Pers. nârdîn; Sab. Ar. transp. rand acc. to DHM:Burgen u. Schlōsser 975 (SB xcvii) v. also Sab. Denkm:82; Gk. na/rdov [so LXX] (through Semites) Lewy:Fremdwörter 40; cf. Löw:No. 316 Lag:M. ii. 25);—abs. ´[[נ]] Ct So 4:14; sf. [[נִרְדִּי תַן רֵיחוֹ]] So 1:12; pl. [[נְרָדִים]] So 4:13.
